src/parallel/zsc-3d-src/poststream.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Copy outward f values from the ghosts into inward f values in the real nodes, then update order parameter phi and the values values for g and f in the ghost layer.

MPI exchange is done using non-blocking receive and blocking send pairs (completed by a wait statement) in alternate directions to avoid deadlock. The componets of g and f that need to be exchanged are packed into buffer arrays before the exchange.

Definition in file poststream.f.

Go to the source code of this file.
